Module uk.gov.gchq.eventlogging
Package event.logging.impl

Class LoggingErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • event.logging.impl.LoggingErrorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidationErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    public class LoggingErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValidationErrorHandler
    Logs all SAXParseExceptions encountered during validation (fatal, error and warning) to a Logger. Fatal and error are logged at ERROR and warnings are logged at WARN. All SAXParseExceptions are captured for later retrieval. Not thread safe.
